edu.self.silvercalc.middleware

Class Middleware

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.self.silvercalc.middleware.Middleware

  • public class Middleware
extends java.lang.Object
    The single responsibility of the Middleware class is to communicate with Display and Database and perform calculations/pass data around for them.
